Where pre-16 high needs place numbers come from

Place numbers are either rolled forward from 2020 to 2021 or your local authority agreed it with ESFA. This provides a base level of funding.

You must agree additional funding above this level with your local authority. Local authorities pay you the top-up funding directly. It is not shown in this statement.
